statements: SELECT * FROM air_traffic_control;
SELECT pilot, message FROM air_traffic_control WHERE communication_timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT pilot, communication_timestamp FROM air_traffic_control WHERE frequency = 'Emergency';
SELECT * FROM air_traffic_control WHERE frequency IN ('Emergency', 'Urgent') ORDER BY communication_timestamp DESC;
SELECT pilot, COUNT(*) AS communication_count FROM air_traffic_control GROUP BY pilot HAVING communication_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM air_traffic_control WHERE pilot = 'John Doe' ORDER BY communication_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT communication_id, pilot FROM air_traffic_control WHERE frequency = 'Tower' AND communication_timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT MAX(communication_timestamp) AS latest_communication FROM air_traffic_control WHERE frequency = 'Approach'
SELECT * FROM air_traffic_control WHERE message LIKE '%emergency%' ORDER BY communication_timestamp ASC
SELECT AVG(LENGTH(message)) AS avg_message_length FROM air_traffic_control
SELECT * FROM air_traffic_control;
SELECT communication_id, sender_name, receiver_name FROM air_traffic_control;
SELECT message FROM air_traffic_control WHERE communication_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM aircraft WHERE capacity > 200;
SELECT aircraft_id, registration_number, manufacturer FROM aircraft WHERE manufacturer = 'Boeing';
SELECT * FROM air_traffic_control WHERE sender_name='John Doe';
SELECT sender_name, receiver_name, timestamp FROM air_traffic_control WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(capacity), manufacturer FROM aircraft GROUP BY manufacturer;
SELECT aircraft_id, registration_number FROM aircraft WHERE capacity >= 200 ORDER BY registration_number DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM air_traffic_control WHERE receiver_name='Tower';
SELECT * FROM aircraft WHERE aircraft_type = 'Boeing 747';
SELECT communication_id, communication_text FROM air_traffic_control_communications ORDER BY communication_timestamp DESC;
SELECT tower_name, location FROM control_tower WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM aircraft ORDER BY aircraft_id DESC;
SELECT aircraft_type, registration_number, airline FROM aircraft WHERE airline = 'Delta';
SELECT * FROM air_traffic_control_communications ORDER BY communication_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT aircraft_type, registration_number FROM aircraft WHERE airline = 'Delta Airlines'
SELECT tower_name, location FROM control_tower WHERE location LIKE '%City%'
SELECT communication_id, communication_text FROM air_traffic_control_communications ORDER BY communication_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM aircraft JOIN control_tower ON aircraft.aircraft_id = control_tower.tower_id
SELECT * FROM air_traffic_controllers;
SELECT controller_name, controller_rating FROM air_traffic_controllers ORDER BY controller_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM airports WHERE airport_type = 'International';
SELECT airport_name, airport_location FROM airports WHERE airport_id = 1;
SELECT flight_number, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flights WHERE arrival_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM air_traffic_controllers WHERE controller_rating > 3 ORDER BY controller_name DESC;
SELECT controller_name, controller_rating FROM air_traffic_controllers WHERE controller_name LIKE 'A%' AND controller_rating < 4;

SELECT controller_name, controller_rating, COUNT(*) AS num_flights FROM air_traffic_controllers JOIN communications ON air_traffic_controllers.controller_id = communications.controller_id GROUP BY controller_name HAVING num_flights > 5;
SELECT airport_name, airport_location, airport_type FROM airports WHERE airport_type = 'International' OR airport_type = 'Domestic' ORDER BY airport_name ASC;
SELECT flight_number, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flights WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01' AND arrival_time < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM air_traffic_controllers;
SELECT controller_name, controller_rank FROM air_traffic_controllers WHERE controller_rank = 'Senior';
SELECT * FROM aircrafts WHERE capacity > 200;
SELECT manufacturer, aircraft_type FROM aircrafts ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT airport_name, location FROM airports WHERE runway_length > 3000 AND terminal_capacity > 500;
SELECT DISTINCT controller_name, controller_rank FROM air_traffic_controllers;
SELECT * FROM aircrafts WHERE manufacturer='Boeing';
SELECT flight_number, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flights ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM communications WHERE communication_type='emergency' AND communication_content LIKE '%mayday%';
SELECT airport_name, location, runway_length FROM airports WHERE terminal_capacity > 500;
